heading: HB04730
0: AN ACT SUBSTANTIALLY INCENTIVIZING FILIPINO INVENTORS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FULLY DEVELOPING THEIR INVENTIONS THAT BENEFIT THE NATION
status: Pending with the Committee on SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY since 2019-09-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04730
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SUBSTANTIALLY INCENTIVIZING FILIPINO INVENTORS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FULLY DEVELOPING THEIR INVENTIONS THAT BENEFIT THE NATION
ABSTRACT : Aims to support Filipino inventors and promote their inventions, especially those that would benefit the community far and wide; and seeks to grant meaningful incentives in order to develop their inventions until they come to fruition.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2019-09-20
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ON 2019-09-24
